column4: Please help! I have run the upgrade from 7.10 to 8.04 and the computer is locked with 7 minutes to go? Can I shutdown and restart?
I am using it to write this but the screen has the upgrade info with the line at 7 minutes to go?
It has been on 7 minutes for about 3 hours
o.0 hmmm and you didnt restart whatever youre doing
